definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: I'm sorry, but I don't have penicillin for your…
sentences.chinese: 我知道，很抱歉，我就是沒有盤尼西林來治你兄弟。
盤尼西林治好了他的肺炎。

sentences.english: My mom is allergic to penicillin, so the doctor gave her a different antibiotic.
sentences.chinese: 我媽媽對盤尼西林過敏，所以醫生給她另一種抗生素。

sentences.english: It is reported that penicillin was invented by a laundryman in a dyer's shop.
sentences.chinese: 據說盤尼西林是一個染坊洗衣服的發明的。
他對盤尼西林無耐藥力。

sentences.english: To whom do we owe the discovery of penicillin?
sentences.chinese: 盤尼西林的發現該歸功於誰？

sentences.english: The doctor injected penicillin into the bloodstream.
sentences.chinese: 醫生將盤尼西林注射入血液。
